General.Title: Subtitle Edit
General.TranslatedBy: 譯者: BAWAN | 風逸蘭 | Jackie Lam | SiderealArt
General.Name: 名稱

About.Title: 關於 Subtitle Edit
About.AboutText1:
Subtitle Edit 是遵循「GNU 公共授權協定」的免費軟體， 您可以自由散佈、修改和使用。
C# 原始碼可從 https://github.com/SubtitleEdit/subtitleedit 取得。
訪問 www.nikse.dk 以取得最新版本。
歡迎您提出任何建議。
電子郵件: mailto:nikse.dk@gmail.com

AddToNames.Title: 加入到 名稱/其它 清單
AddToNames.Description: 加入到 名稱/其它 清單 (區分大小寫)

AddToOcrReplaceList.Title: 加入到 OCR 取代清單
AddToOcrReplaceList.Description: 加入行對到 OCR 取代清單 (區分大小寫)

AddToUserDictionary.Title: 加入到使用者字典
AddToUserDictionary.Description: 加入單字到使用者字典 (區分大小寫)

AddWaveform.Title: 建立波形資料
AddWaveform.PleaseWait: 這可能需要幾分鐘 - 請稍候
AddWaveform.NoAudioTracksFoundGenerateEmptyWaveform: No audio tracks found! Generate empty waveform?

AdjustDisplayDuration.Title: 調整持續時間
AdjustDisplayDuration.SetAsPercent: 設定為持續時間百分比
AdjustDisplayDuration.Note: 說明: 顯示時間不會重疊下一個文字的起始時間

AssaAttachments.Title: Advanced Sub Station Alpha attachments
AssaAttachments.ImageResized: Image resized to fit current window

AssaSetPosition.SetPosInfo: Click on video to toggle set/move position
AssaSetPosition.ResolutionMissing: PlayResX/PlayResY are not set - set the resolution now?

AudioToText.Title: 語音轉文字
AudioToText.ExtractingAudioUsingX: 正在使用 {0} 擷取音訊...

AutoBreakUnbreakLines.TitleUnbreak: 從已選的行中移除換行字元
AutoBreakUnbreakLines.OnlyBreakLinesLongerThan: 僅換行超過下列長度的行
AutoBreakUnbreakLines.OnlyUnbreakLinesLongerThan: 僅不換行超過下列長度的行

BatchConvert.Title: 批次轉換
BatchConvert.OverwriteOriginalFiles: 覆寫原始檔案 (如果格式已變更則使用新的副檔案名稱)
BatchConvert.SetMinMsBetweenSubtitles: 設定字幕間的最小毫秒數
BatchConvert.FilterSrtNoUtf8BOM: SubRip (.srt) files without UTF-8 BOM header
BatchConvert.FilterMoreThanTwoLines: More than two lines in one subtitle
BatchConvert.TransportStreamOverrideXPosition: 覆寫原始 X 軸位置
BatchConvert.TransportStreamOverrideYPosition: 複寫原始 Y 軸位置

BinEdit.CenterSelectedLines: Center selected lines (horizontally, keep vertical position)
BinEdit.TopAlignSelectedLines: Top align selected lines (keep horizontal position)
BinEdit.BottomAlignSelectedLines: Bottom align selected lines (keep horizontal position)

ChangeCasing.Title: 變更大小寫
ChangeCasing.FixNamesCasing: 修復名稱大小寫 (依據 Dictionaries\NamesEtc.xml)
ChangeCasing.FixOnlyNamesCasing: 僅修復名稱大小寫 (依據 Dictionaries\NamesEtc.xml)

ChangeFrameRate.Title: 變更影格率
ChangeFrameRate.FrameRateNotChanged: 影格率相同 - 無可轉換的內容

CheckForUpdates.Title: 檢查有無更新
CheckForUpdates.CheckingForUpdatesNoneAvailable: 您正在使用最新版本的 Subtitle Edit :)

CompareSubtitles.Title: 比較字幕
CompareSubtitles.XNumberOfDifferenceAndPercentChanged: 差異數量: {0} (已變更單字的 {1:0.##}%)
CompareSubtitles.XNumberOfDifferenceAndPercentLettersChan: 差異數量: {0} (已變更字母的 {1:0.##}%)
CompareSubtitles.CannotCompareWithImageBasedSubtitles: 無法比較基於圖像的字幕

DCinemaProperties.Title: 數位電影內容 (Interop)
DCinemaProperties.ZPositionHelp: 如果 Z 位置為零則是 2D 方式: 正數可將文字推遠，負數可將文字拉近

DurationsBridgeGaps.Title: 橋接持續時間之間的小間隔
DurationsBridgeGaps.GapToNext: 與下一行的間隔時間 (秒)
DurationsBridgeGaps.ProlongEndTime: >間隔時間分配給上一行文字
DurationsBridgeGaps.DivideEven: 間隔時間均分給前後兩行文字

DvdSubRip.WrongIfoType: IFO 類型是 '{0}' 而不是 'DVDVIDEO-VTS'。{1}請嘗試另一個不同於 {2} 的檔案

EbuSaveOptions.Title: EBU 儲存選項
EbuSaveOptions.TeletextCharsShouldBe38: 'Max# of chars per row' for teletext should be 38!
EbuSaveOptions.NewLineRows: Number of rows added by a new line
EbuSaveOptions.MaxLengthError: 行 {0} 超出了經由 {2} 的最大長度 ({1}): {3}
EbuSaveOptions.UseBoxForOneNewLine: Check 'Use box around text' for only one new-line

ExportCustomText.Title: 匯出自訂文字格式
ExportCustomText.SubtitleExportedInCustomFormatToX: 已將字幕以自訂格式匯出至: {0}

ExportFcpXmlAdvanced.Title: Export Final Cut Pro XML advanced

ExportPngXml.Title: 匯出 BDN XML/PNG
ExportPngXml.SaveBluRaySupAs: 選擇藍光 sup 檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.SaveVobSubAs: 選擇 VobSub 檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.SaveFabImageScriptAs: 選擇 FAB 圖片腳本檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.SaveDvdStudioProStlAs: 選擇 DVD Studio Pro STL 檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.SaveDigitalCinemaInteropAs: 選擇 Digital Cinema Interop 檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.SaveDigitalCinemaSmpte2014: 選擇 Digital Cinema SMPTE 2014 檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.SavePremiereEdlAs: 選擇 Premiere EDL 檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.SaveFcpAs: 選擇 Final Cut Pro xml 檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.SaveDostAs: 選擇 DoStudio dost 檔案名稱
ExportPngXml.FcpUseFullPathUrl: Use full image path url in FCP xml

ExtractDateTimeInfo.Title: 將時間建立為文字
ExtractDateTimeInfo.OpenVideoFile: 選擇要從中擷取 日期/時間 訊息的視訊檔案

FixCommonErrors.Title: 修復一般錯誤
FixCommonErrors.Step1: 步驟 1/2 - 選擇要修復哪些錯誤
FixCommonErrors.RemovedEmptyLinesUnusedLineBreaks: 移除 空行/無用換行字元
FixCommonErrors.RemoveLineBreaks: 移除只有一個句子的短文字中的換行字元
FixCommonErrors.RemoveLineBreaksAll: 移除除對話外所有短文字中的換行字元
FixCommonErrors.FixUppercaseIInsideLowercaseWords: 修復小寫單字中的 'i' 為大寫 (OCR 錯誤)
FixCommonErrors.FixDoubleApostrophes: 修復兩個單引號字元 ('') 為一個雙引號 (")
FixCommonErrors.AddPeriods: 在下一個以大寫字母開頭的行後面加入句號
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterParagraph: 在段落後以大寫字母開頭
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterPeriodInsid: 在段落中的句號後以大寫字母開頭
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterColon: 在冒號/分號後以大寫字母開頭
FixCommonErrors.FixLowercaseIToUppercaseI: 修復單獨的小寫 'i' 為 'I' (英語)
FixCommonErrors.FixCommonOcrErrors: 修復一般 OCR 錯誤 (使用 OCR 取代清單)
FixCommonErrors.CommonOcrErrorsFixed: 已修復一般 OCR 錯誤 (使用 OcrReplaceList 檔案): {0}
FixCommonErrors.RemoveDialogFirstInNonDialogs: Remove start dash in first line for non dialogs
FixCommonErrors.FixTurkishAnsi: 修復土耳其語 ANSI (冰島) 字母為 Unicode
FixCommonErrors.FixSpanishInvertedQuestionAndExclamation: 修復西班牙語反問號和感嘆號
FixCommonErrors.RemoveHyphensSingleLine: Remove dialog dashes in single lines
FixCommonErrors.FixHyphensInDialogs: Fix dash in dialogs via style: {0}
FixCommonErrors.NothingToFixBut: 沒有需要修復的內容，但有幾個問題可以改進 - 詳見記錄
FixCommonErrors.XFixedBut: {0} issue(s) fixed but the subtitle still contain errors - see log for details
FixCommonErrors.XCouldBeFixedBut: {0} issue(s) could be fixed but the subtitle will still contain errors - see log for details
FixCommonErrors.FixFirstLetterToUppercaseAfterParagraph: 修復段落後的首字母為大寫
FixCommonErrors.MergeShortLineAll: 合併除對話外的所有短行
FixCommonErrors.FixInvalidItalicTagsExample: What do I care. -> What do I care.
FixCommonErrors.RemoveUnneededSpacesExample: Hey you , there. -> Hey you, there.
FixCommonErrors.FixUppercaseIInsideLowercaseWordsExample: The earth is fIat. -> The earth is flat.
FixCommonErrors.FixLowercaseIToUppercaseIExample: What do i care. -> What do I care.
FixCommonErrors.StartTimeLaterThanEndTime: 文字編號 {0}: 起始時間晚於結束時間: {4}{1} -> {2} {3}
FixCommonErrors.UnableToFixStartTimeLaterThanEndTime: 無法修復文字編號 {0}: 起始時間晚於結束時間: {1}
FixCommonErrors.FixUppercaseIInsideLowercaseWord: 修復小寫單字中的大寫 'i'
FixCommonErrors.FixMissingPeriodAtEndOfLine: 在行末加入遺失的句號
FixCommonErrors.FixMusicNotation: 用自己偏好的符號取代音符 (例如 âTª)
FixCommonErrors.FixMusicNotationExample: 'âTª sweet dreams are' -> '♫ sweet dreams are'
FixCommonErrors.FixDialogsOneLineExample:
Hi John! - Hi Ida! -> Hi John!
- Hi Ida!
FixCommonErrors.RemoveDialogFirstInNonDialogsExample: - How are you? -> How are you?

GenerateVideoWithBurnedInSubs.Title: Generate video with burned-in subtitle
GenerateVideoWithBurnedInSubs.InfoAssaOff: Note: Advanced Substation Alpha styling supported.
GenerateVideoWithBurnedInSubs.InfoAssaOn: Note: Advanced Substation Alpha styling will be used :)
GenerateVideoWithBurnedInSubs.TimeRemainingMinutesAndSeconds: 剩餘時間: {0} 分 {1} 秒
GenerateVideoWithBurnedInSubs.TargetFileSize: 目標檔案大小 (需要 Two-pass 編碼)

GetDictionaries.Title: 是否需要字典？
GetDictionaries.DescriptionLine1: Subtitle Edit 的拼寫檢查基於 NHunspell 引擎，它
GetDictionaries.DescriptionLine2: 使用的是 LibreOffice 的拼寫檢查字典。
GetDictionaries.ChooseLanguageAndClickDownload: 選擇您的語言並點選「下載」

GetTesseractDictionaries.Title: 是否需要字典？
GetTesseractDictionaries.DescriptionLine1: 從網站取得 Tesseract OCR 字典
GetTesseractDictionaries.ChooseLanguageAndClickDownload: 選擇您的語言並點選「下載」

GoogleTranslate.Title: 谷歌翻譯
GoogleTranslate.PleaseWait: 這可能需要一段時間，請稍候...
GoogleTranslate.MsClientSecretNeeded:
Sorry, you need a Cognitive Services 'Translator Text' key from Microsoft to use the latest Microsoft Translator.
Go to "Options -> Settings -> Tools" to enter your key.
GoogleTranslate.GoogleNoApiKeyWarning: Trying to translate without API key... (slow and limited data). To use an API key go to "Options -> Settings -> Tools" to enter your Google translate API key.
GoogleTranslate.TranslateBlockInfo: Go to translator and paste text, copy result back to clipboard and click the button below
GoogleTranslate.TranslateBlockGetFromClipboard: Get translated text from clipboard (Ctrl + V)
GoogleTranslate.TranslateBlockClipboardError2: Go to translator and translate, the copy result to clipboard and click this button again.

ImportShotChanges.GetShotChangesWithFfmpeg: 使用 FFmpeg 產生場景變更
ImportShotChanges.SensitivityDescription: Lower value gives more scene changes

ImportText.Title: 匯入純文字
ImportText.OneSubtitleIsOneFile: 多個檔案 - 每個檔案是獨立的字幕

JoinSubtitles.Information: 加入字幕以合併 (支援拖曳)
JoinSubtitles.AlreadyCorrectTimeCodes: 檔案已經有正確的時間碼了
JoinSubtitles.AppendTimeCodes: Add end time of previous file

File.ExportAdobeEncoreFabImageScript: Adobe Encore FAB 圖像腳本...

Edit.Title: 編輯
Edit.ShowUndoHistory: 顯示歷史記錄 (用於復原)
Edit.InsertUnicodeControlCharacters: 插入 Unicode 控制字符
Edit.FixRtlViaUnicodeControlCharacters: 使用 Unicode 控制字元修復 RTL (針對已選的行)
Edit.RemoveUnicodeControlCharacters: 移除 Unicode 控制字符 (從已選的行)
Edit.ReverseRightToLeftStartEnd: 反轉 RTL 起始/結束 (針對已選的行)
Edit.ShowOriginalTextInAudioAndVideoPreview: 在 音訊/視訊 預覽中顯示原始文字

Tools.SubtitlesBridgeGaps: 橋接持續時間間的間隔...

Networking.ShowSessionInfoAndLog: 顯示工作階段訊息和記錄

ToolBar.RemoveTextForHi: 移除為聽障者設計的文字

ContextMenu.AdvancedSubStationAlphaStyles: Advanced Sub Station Alpha 樣式...

ContextMenu.AutoDurationCurrentLine: 自動設定持續時間 (目前行)

ContextMenu.ColumnInsertEmptyTextAndShiftCellsDown: 插入空白文字並將單元格下移
ContextMenu.ColumnImportTextAndShiftCellsDown: 匯入文字並將單元格下移

ContextMenu.MergeSelectedLinesAsDialog: 將已選的行合併為對話

ContextMenu.FixCommonErrorsInSelectedLines: 修復已選的行中的一般錯誤...
ContextMenu.ChangeCasingForSelectedLines: 變更已選的行的大小寫...

Main.ErrorLoad7Zip: 此檔案似乎是一個 7-Zip 壓縮檔案。本程式無法開啟壓縮檔案。
Main.ErrorLoadPng: 此檔案似乎是一個 PNG 圖像檔案。本程式無法開啟 PNG 檔案。
Main.ErrorLoadJpg: 此檔案似乎是一個 JPG 圖像檔案。本程式無法開啟 JPG 檔案。
Main.ErrorLoadSrr: 此檔案似乎是一個 ReScene .srr 檔案，而不是一個字幕檔案。
Main.ErrorLoadTorrent: 此檔案似乎是一個 BitTorrent 檔案，而不是一個字幕檔案。

Settings.Title: 設定
Settings.OpenDataFolder: Open the Subtitle Edit data folder
Settings.ShowFrameRate: 在工具列中顯示影格率
Settings.AutoDetectAnsiEncoding: 自動偵測 ANSI 編碼
Settings.VideoAutoOpen: Auto-open video file when opening subtitle
Settings.RememberRecentFiles: 記住最近的檔案 (用於重新開啟)
Settings.StartWithLastFileLoaded: 以上次載入的檔案開始
Settings.RememberPositionAndSize: 記住主視窗的位置和大小
Settings.ApplyAssaOverrideTags: Apply ASSA override tags to selection
Settings.ShowLineBreaksAs: 將清單檢視中的換行字元顯示為
Settings.MainListViewDoubleClickAction: 在主視窗清單檢視中連按兩下某行時的相應動作
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinus1SecAn: 移至視訊位置 - 1 秒並暫停
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinusHalfSe: 移至視訊位置 - 0.5 秒並暫停
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinus1SecAn: 移至視訊位置 - 1 秒並播放
Settings.MainListViewEditTextAndPause: 移至編輯文字框並於視訊位置暫停
Settings.SplitBehaviorPrevious: Add gap to the left of split point (focus right)
Settings.SplitBehaviorHalf: Add gap in the center of split point (focus left)
Settings.SplitBehaviorNext: Add gap to the right of split point (focus left)
Settings.DirectShowDescription: quartz.dll 在 System32 資料夾中
Settings.MpvPlayerDescription: https://mpv.io/ - 免費、開源、且跨平台的媒體播放器
Settings.VlcMediaPlayerDescription: libvlc.dll 來自 VLC 媒體播放器 1.1.0 或更新
Settings.VlcBrowseToLabel: VLC 程式路徑 (僅在您使用便攜式版本時方需設定)
Settings.WaveformAllowOverlap: 允許重疊 (當 移動/調整大小 時)
Settings.WaveformSetVideoPosMoveStartEnd: Set video position when moving start/end
Settings.WaveformListViewFocusMouseEnter: 當滑鼠移過時將焦點設定到清單檢視
Settings.WaveformSnapToShotChanges: Snap to scene changes (hold Shift to override)
Settings.WaveformBorderHitMs1: 邊框標記的最短相接間隔須為
Settings.WaveformAndSpectrogramsFolderEmpty: 清空 'Spectrograms' 和 'Waveforms' 資料夾
Settings.WaveformAndSpectrogramsFolderInfo: 'Waveforms' 和 'Spectrograms' 資料夾含有 {0} 個檔案 ({1:0.00} MB)
Settings.WaveformUseFFmpeg: 使用 FFmpeg 進行波形擷取
Settings.WaveformBrowseToVLC: 瀏覽 VLC 便攜式版本
Settings.NamesIgnoreLists: 名稱/忽略 清單 (區分大小寫)
Settings.UseOnlineNames: 使用網上的 名稱/其它 XML 檔案
Settings.NetworkSessionNewSound: Play sound file when new message arrives
Settings.PlayXSecondsAndBack: 播放 X 秒後返回，X 為
Settings.FixCommonOcrErrorsUseHardcodedRules: 修復 OCR 一般錯誤 - 同時使用硬編碼規則
Settings.FixCommonerrorsFixShortDisplayTimesAllow: 修復較短的顯示時間 - 允許移動起始時間
Settings.FavoriteSubtitleFormatsNote: Note: favorite formats will be shown first when selecting a format, the default format will always be shown first
Settings.ToggleDockUndockOfVideoControls: 切換 停靠/不停靠 視訊控制項
Settings.CreateSetEndAddNewAndGoToNew: 設定結束時間，加入新的起始時間並移至新的起始時間
Settings.AdjustViaEndAutoStartAndGoToNext: 透過結束時間位置調整並移至下一行
Settings.AdjustSetEndMinusGapAndStartNextHere: Set end minus gap, go to next and start next here
Settings.AdjustSetEndTimeAndGoToNext: Set end and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetStartAutoDurationAndGoToNext: 設定起始時間，自動設定持續時間並移至下一行
Settings.AdjustSetEndNextStartAndGoToNext: 設定結束時間及下個起始時間並移至下一行
Settings.AdjustStartDownEndUpAndGoToNext: ↓ = 設定起始時間，↑ = 設定結束時間並移至下一行
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndEndOfPrevious: Set start and set end of previous (minus min gap)
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndEndOfPreviousAndGoToNex: Set start and set end of previous and go to next (minus min gap)
Settings.AdjustSelected100MsForward: 已選的行前移 100 毫秒
Settings.AdjustSelected100MsBack: 已選的行後移 100 毫秒
Settings.AdjustStartXMsBack: 起始時間後移 {0} 毫秒
Settings.AdjustStartXMsForward: 起始時間前移 {0} 毫秒
Settings.AdjustEndXMsBack: 結束時間後移 {0} 毫秒
Settings.AdjustEndXMsForward: 結束時間前移 {0} 毫秒
Settings.AdjustStartOneFrameBackKeepGapPrev: 起始時間後移 1 幀 (keep gap to previous if close)
Settings.AdjustStartOneFrameForwardKeepGapPrev: 起始時間後移 1 幀 (keep gap to previous if close)
Settings.AdjustEndOneFrameBackKeepGapNext: 結束時間後移 1 幀 (keep gap to next if close)
Settings.AdjustEndOneFrameForwardKeepGapNext: 結束時間前移 1 幀 (keep gap to next if close)
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndOffsetTheWholeSubtitle: Set start time, offset the whole subtitle
Settings.AdjustSetEndAndOffsetTheRestAndGoToNext: Set end, offset the rest and go to next
Settings.AdjustSnapStartToNextShotChange: Snap selected lines start to next scene change
Settings.AdjustSnapStartToNextShotChangeWithGap: Snap selected lines start to next scene change with min. gap
Settings.AdjustSnapEndToPreviousShotChange: Snap selected lines end to previous scene change
Settings.AdjustSnapEndToPreviousShotChangeWithGap: Snap selected lines end to previous scene change with min. gap
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextShotChange: Extend selected lines to next scene change (or next subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextShotChangeWithGap: Extend selected lines to next scene change with min. gap (or next subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousShotChange: Extend selected lines to previous scene change (or previous subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousShotChangeWithGap: Extend selected lines to previous scene change with min. gap (or previous subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextSubtitle: Extend selected lines to next subtitle
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousSubtitle: Extend selected lines to previous subtitle
Settings.AdjustExtendCurrentSubtitle: Extend current line to next subtitle or max duration
Settings.AdjustExtendPreviousLineEndToCurrentStar: Extend previous line's end to current's start
Settings.AdjustExtendNextLineStartToCurrentEnd: Extend next line's start to current's end
Settings.RecalculateDurationOfCurrentSubtitle: 重新計算目前字幕的持續時間
Settings.MainCreateStartDownEndUp: 使用 ↓ 建立新的起始時間，使用 ↑ 設定結束時間
Settings.GoToNextPlayTranslate: Go to next line (and play in 'Translate mode')
Settings.GoToNextCursorAtEnd: Go to next line and set cursor at end
Settings.GoToPreviousPlayTranslate: Go to previous line (and play in 'Translate mode')
Settings.GoToCurrentSubtitleStart: 移至目前行的起始時間
Settings.GoToCurrentSubtitleEnd: 移至目前行的結束時間
Settings.GoToPreviousSubtitleAndFocusVideo: Go to previous line and set video position
Settings.GoToNextSubtitleAndFocusVideo: Go to next line and set video position
Settings.GoToPrevSubtitleAndPlay: Go to previous line and play
Settings.GoToNextSubtitleAndPlay: Go to next line and play
Settings.ToggleFocus: 在清單檢視和字幕文字框之間切換焦點
Settings.ToggleFocusWaveform: Toggle focus between list view and waveform/spectrogram
Settings.CopyTextOnly: 僅複製文字到剪貼簿 (已選的行)
Settings.CopyTextOnlyFromOriginalToCurrent: Copy text from original to current
Settings.AutoDurationSelectedLines: 自動設定持續時間 (已選的行)
Settings.FixRTLViaUnicodeChars: 透過 Unicode 控制字元修復 RTL
Settings.RemoveRTLUnicodeChars: 移除 Unicode 控制字元
Settings.ReverseStartAndEndingForRtl: 反轉 RTL 開始/結束
Settings.WaveformAddTextHere: 加入文字到此處 (用於新的選擇部份)
Settings.WaveformAddTextHereFromClipboard: 加入文字到此處 (從剪貼板用於新的選擇部份)
Settings.WaveformPlayFirstSelectedSubtitle: 播放第一個選擇的字幕
Settings.WaveformGuessStart: Auto adjust start via volume/scene change
Settings.GoBack1FrameWithPlay: 向前一個影格 (繼續播放)
Settings.GoForward1FrameWithPlay: 向後一個影格 (繼續播放)
Settings.GoToStartCurrent: Set video pos to start of current subtitle
Settings.ToggleStartEndCurrent: Toggle video pos between start/end of current subtitle
Settings.WaveformGoToPrevSubtitle: Go to previous subtitle (from video position)
Settings.WaveformGoToNextSubtitle: Go to next subtitle (from video position)
Settings.WaveformSelectNextSubtitle: Select next subtitle (from video position, keep video pos)
Settings.SyntaxColorDurationIfTooSmall: 若持續時間太短則著色
Settings.SyntaxColorDurationIfTooLarge: 若持續時間太長則著色
Settings.SyntaxColorTextMoreThanMaxLines: 若文字多於 {0} 行則著色
Settings.MergeSelectedLinesAndUnbreakCjk: Merge selected lines and unbreak without space (CJK)
Settings.MergeSelectedLinesOnlyFirstText: Merge selected lines, keep only first non-empty text
Settings.ToggleTranslationAndOriginalInPreviews: 在 視訊/音訊 預覽中切換翻譯和原文
Settings.ListViewColumnDeleteAndShiftUp: Column, delete text and shift up
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveLastWordDown: 將上一行的最後一個單字移至下一行
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFirstWordFromNextUp: 將下一行的第一個單字移至上一行
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFirstWordUpCurrent: Move first word from next line up (current subtitle)
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFromCursorToNext: Move text after cursor position to next subtitle and go to next
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveLastWordDownCurrent: Move last word from first line down (current subtitle)
Settings.MainTextBoxAutoBreakFromPos: Break at first space from cursor position
Settings.MainTextBoxAutoBreakFromPosAndGoToNext: Break at first space from cursor position and go to next
Settings.UseDoNotBreakAfterList: 使用不在後面換行的清單 (用於自動換行)
Settings.BreakEarlyForLineEnding: Break early for end of sentence (.!?)
Settings.FontNote: Note: These font settings are for the Subtitle Edit UI only. Setting a font for a subtitle is normally done in the video player, but can also be done when using a subtitle format with built-in font information like "Advanced Sub Station Alpha" or via export to image based formats.

VobSubOcr.StartOcrFrom: 從下列字幕編號開始進行 OCR:
VobSubOcr.LoadingVobSubImages: 正在載入 VobSub 圖像...
VobSubOcr.LoadingImageCompareDatabase: 正在載入圖像比較資料庫...
VobSubOcr.ConvertingImageCompareDatabase: 正在將圖像比較資料庫轉換為新的格式 (images.db/images.xml)...
VobSubOcr.UnableToCreateCharacterDatabaseFolder: 無法建立「字元資料庫資料夾」: {0}
VobSubOcr.TransparentMinAlpha: 最小 Alpha 值 (0 = 透明，255 = 完全可見)
VobSubOcr.TransportStreamGetColor: 使用色彩 (將分割某些行)
VobSubOcr.AutoBreakSubtitleIfMoreThanTwoLines: 如果超過兩行自動換行
VobSubOcr.OcrAutoCorrectionSpellChecking: OCR 自動修正/拼寫檢查
VobSubOcr.ImportTextWithMatchingTimeCodes: 匯入符合時間碼的文字...
VobSubOcr.SaveAllSubtitleImagesWithHtml: 使用 HTML 索引儲存所有圖像...
VobSubOcr.TryModiForUnknownWords: 未知單字嘗試使用 Microsoft MODI OCR
VobSubOcr.UseTimeCodesFromIdx: 從 .idx 檔案使用時間碼
VobSubOcr.InspectCompareMatchesForCurrentImage: 為目前的圖像檢查比較符合數...
VobSubOcr.EditLastAdditions: 編輯上個圖像比較附加...
VobSubOcr.DiscardTitle: 要捨棄在 OCR 的變更嗎？
VobSubOcr.DiscardText: Do you want to discard changes made in current OCR session?
VobSubOcr.LetterCombinations: Letter combinations that might be split as one image

VobSubOcrCharacterInspect.Title: 為目前的圖像檢查比較符合數

VobSubOcrNewFolder.Title: 新增資料夾
VobSubOcrNewFolder.Message: 新字元資料庫資料夾的名稱

VobSubOcrSetItalicAngle.Title: 設置斜體角度
VobSubOcrSetItalicAngle.Description: 調整數值，直到字型變正常，而非斜體。注意：原始圖片應為斜體。

OcrPreprocessing.Title: OCR 圖片預處理
OcrPreprocessing.AdjustAlpha: Adjust value until text is shown clearly (normally values between 200 and 300)

Watermark.Title: 水印
Watermark.ErrorUnicodeEncodingOnly: Watermark only works with unicode file encoding.

Waveform.ClickToAddWaveformAndSpectrogram: 點選以加入波形/頻譜圖
Waveform.AddParagraphHereAndPasteText: 從剪貼簿加入文字到此處

WaveformGenerateTimeCodes.Title: 猜測時間碼
WaveformGenerateTimeCodes.BlockAverageVolMin1: 區塊平均音量必須高於
WaveformGenerateTimeCodes.BlockAverageVolMax1: 區塊平均音量必須低於
